subject: Test Suites in HTML output
msgSnippet: I ve got a number of TestSuites for a system I development; each TestSuite represents a different layer on the system. I use Ant Junit tasks to execute and
messageBody:
I've got a number of TestSuites for a system I development; each
TestSuite represents a different layer on the system. I use Ant Junit
tasks to execute and create the HTML reports.
The problem I have is that if I have the HTML produced doesn't reflect
the nested TestSuite structure I used.
For example if I have 3 layer a, B & C with each an appropriate Test
Suite I'd want teh top-level HTML to show the results of TestSuite A
which consolidates the results from B & C. Essentially some similiar
to the tree structure that the Swing JUnit runner produced in the tree
panel.
At the moment all the TestCases are expanded into a single page in the
HTML under the main top-level TestSuite and with a total of over 700
tests it is difficult to use.
